title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing 'Ok' after changing the project properties to use the project as the source folder and output location, the following error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The issue here is that setting the output location and classpath are treated as two separate operations. By setting the output location first, it creates an illegal state.
SR: 204:1. Create a project with 'src' as the source folder and 'bin' as the output location. 2. Open the project properties and change the settings to use the project as the source folder and output location.
